Key Match Events: Aaron Judge hit a two-run drive into Monument Park for his first home run of this postseason
Cleveland went 0-for-7 with runners in scoring position and stranded 11 runners
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees lead the ALCS 2-0 for the first time since 2009 against the Los Angeles Angels
Others: Gerrit Cole was chased after four walks in 4 1/3 innings
José Ramírez hit a ninth-inning home run off Luke Weaver, just the second earned run New York's bullpen has allowed over 23 1/3 innings in six postseason games
